name: ClickTecs
overview: ClickTecs is a specialized Digital Marketing Agency, headquartered in Toronto, Canada. We have made it our mission to help businesses navigate the shift from offline marketing to digital marketing by combining marketing creativity with technical expertise. Over the last decade, ClickTecs has been providing Digital Marketing Consulting services to businesses of all sizes. We have clients that span the globe from small start-up companies to large multi-national firms. Our core focus revolves around these key services: • Website Design and Development • Search Engine Optimization (SEO) • Social Media Optimization (SMO) • Pay Per Click Marketing • Online Reputation Management • Mobile Marketing o Mobile Sites, Mobile Search, Mobile Application Development Our Team’s approach to web marketing combines the skills of: • Business & Marketing Executives • Web Design & Application Development Professionals • Search Engine & Web Analytics Experts We know that great design, search engine positioning or even the newest technology, will not be enough to effectively maximize the power of the Internet. It is the combination of creative, analytical, technical and strategic minds that can best ensure success. Our team utilizes state of the art technology, combined with proven processes and experience in multiple channels to deliver a digital marketing solution catered to your business needs. Contact us today to discuss how your team at ClickTecs can help position you above the competition in the Digital world.
